events.text: - Each step he takes causes a loud squelch to echo faintly between the ill roots. -
- Suddenly, after turning a steep angle, the squelches are muted by what sounds like a giant, brooding infant chewing on a pacifier. -
- With bathed breath, Durinn raises the light of the rune to illuminate the area he is in. -
- Durinn proceeds through a section of the roots that collapsed onto itself due to the rot that took hold on it. -
- Up, in between a spire of roots, sits the passage for Midgard, the world of humans. A breeze flows from the passage, firm but gentle much like the distant eagle that is its source. -
- What Midgard looks like is largely obscured to Durinn, though, as an enormous slithering mass is blocking the view, sinking its teeth in the tender roots that form the passage. -
